bgDescription: A small, compact proportioning data card, the data of which is read by the Synthesizer to gain access to Synthesis' corresponding products.
description: Used to immediately revive and heal 25% of a selected downed Resonator's Max HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. (This effect only applies to your own Resonators in Co-op Mode)
obtainDescription: Used to immediately revive and heal 25% of a selected downed Resonator's Max HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. (This effect only applies to your own Resonators in Co-op Mode)
